recipesJson.name: Oreo Milkshake | Developed
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: Skiddlz, AlfredPudding, Max Savage, Graham, folkart, and guest Wayne Walker. 
This recipe is our representation of a perfect Oreo Milkshake. Thick ice cream and crunchy, crushed oreos that is an amazing shake and vape. Full Development Notes on DEVELOPED Ep. 5 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DlljLSHD74o
Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/developedDIY

recipe_flavors.name: Deep Fried Cookies and Cream â€“ Super Concentrate

reviews.text: you can get RF DFC&C at diy-ejuice.com, just got this stuff in the mail today for the first time and DAMN. That is the only extract that tastes as close to an oreo as you can get, and this recipe is absolutely addicting
Any replacement ideas for Deep froes CandC cus it's off the market?
5 plus stars, got better, if that's possible, with time. Kudos all around.

Pretty much a spot on oreo milkshake. The chocolate is undeniably an Oreo chocolate, it's even dry tasting for Gods sake! Great job on this one. I SNV this one, curious to see how it is after a steep. Thanks so much!
